official_title: A bill to provide that the amount collected as a result of an audit of taxpayer returns shall not be used in evaluating the performance of Internal Revenue Service personnel participating in the audit.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of amounts collected pursuant to audits or investigations of taxpayer returns as a basis for the evaluations of the Internal Revenue Service personnel who participated in such audits or investigations.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the amount collected as a result of an audit of taxpayer returns shall not be used in evaluating the performance of Internal Revenue Service personnel participating in the audit.
